title: The Tale of the Sad Christmas Dragon
description: Bored around Christmas, a young girl ventures into the forest hoping to find an elf to grant her a wish. Instead, she finds a dragon . And not just any It's the Christmas Dragon!But what does a Christmas Dragon even do? And why is it so sad? The girl won't leave its side until they've figured it out!This short fairytale is the perfect bedtime story for the youngest or when you need something heartwarming for your morning coffee during the cold winter season.It's a 10 min read and suitable for kids and adults of all ages.
author: Karen Lykkebo
